==========
PingdomLib
==========

v0.1.3
------

This library exposes the functionality of the pingdom API for usage within
python. 


TODO
====

API Calls not yet implemented
-----------------------------

* Contacts
* Reports.email
* Reports.public
* Reports.shared
* Results
* Settings
* Summary.average
* Summary.outage
* Summary.perforamnce
* Summary.probes
* Single

Other features
--------------
* Gzip Compression, enabled by default
